summary: The purpose of this article is to report the sequencing of the complete genome sequence of bacterium Thermovirga lienii Cas60314 and to describe the organism's phenotypic and genomic features.

use_cases.case: The Thermovirga lienii Cas60314 chromosomal DNA sequence represented by the accession CP003096 is part of the main focus of this study, in which the authors describe the sequencing and annotation of the Cas60314 genome, its genomic features, and its deposition in various databases.
